CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( TEXT(d4c_Producer__r.d4c_NPNStatus__c) = "Active", ISPICKVAL(d4c_Producer__r.d4c_Type__c, 'Agency') ), "NPN is for an Agency (Not an Agent)",
IF( TEXT(d4c_Producer__r.d4c_NPNStatus__c) = "Invalid NPN", "The NPN was rejected by NIPR",
IF( OR( TEXT(d4c_Producer__r.d4c_NPNStatus__c) = "Active", TEXT(d4c_Producer__r.d4c_NPNStatus__c) = "Processing" ), "", d4c_Producer__r.d4c_NPNSyncError__c ) ) )
CustomField.label: NPN Sync Error
